name: Hamster Powered Drilling Machine
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48
Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Drill your way down into the depths of the earth and find treasures untold. Upgrade your drill and dig deeper than ever before. Fight your way to the top (bottom?) of the leaderboard and claim your throne.

DISCLAIMER: No hamsters were harmed in the making of this game.

Credits:

Vinnie Gray: Programming, Modelling, Texturing, Sound Effects
Silver Branch: Programming, UI Design
Rosareven: Moral Support
